attributes.action: To rid the dole for people who are able to work, but prefer to rely on others.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who are unable to get a job because of their grades shouldnt be allowed dole, they made the choice to mess around in school, and looking at the people around me in my school now, breaking peoples noses, skitting, skipping school, id hate to think when im older that I am supporting their crack inhibited lifestyles, I don't want to be supporting them in anyway at all, the dole should be stopped for people with slight disabilities, minor disabilities and people who there isn't anyting wron with, I find it awful that they are having a better life than we are it also makes me sick at night to think that my mother is supporting our next door neighbour, who steals, beats people, prostitutes and takes drugs, surely it is wrong to support their habits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
